alert.note: Alert for Coastal Levy; Inland Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 9:26AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Levy County through 1015 AM EDT... At 926 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Bronson to Fowlers Bluff to 6 miles southwest of Horseshoe Point. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Williston, Chiefland, Bronson, Williston Highlands, East Bronson, Fowlers Bluff, Williston Municipal Airport, Manattee Road, Andrews, Otter Creek, Lebanon, and Manatee Springs State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
